title: Jr. Full-Stack Developer
desc: Experienced Angular Framework using by Typescript in two diffirent Project, which are SecurityGateWay and License Creator.
Helped Springboot Framework using by Java with Hibernate in one Project, which is License Creator.
Learned and experienced Pentaho in diffirent Project. Created some new schema and updated some old schema.
Worked in half Agile environment and joined Sprint planing and weekly Meeting.
Used GitLab for projects saving and execution.
